Dialogue.Page: Hey! I'm Onbvb, creator of Catastrophe!

DialogueOption.Text: I wasn't all that keen on Catastrophe...

Dialogue.Page: Good question! I'm actually a computer because I've always liked Cyborgs and the like.
Therefore, I decided to turn myself into a computer!

DialogueOption.Text: Neat, anyways, I'm going to talk to other people now.

Dialogue.Page: It was much more of a writing exercise, since I'm awful at puzzle design, but hopefully my next mod should be better at that.

DialogueOption.Text: Anyways, I'm going to go talk to other people now.

Dialogue.Page: So sorry that you didn't enjoy my mod.
It is a little barebones, but not every mod is going to be for everyone.
Go try some other mods though, maybe you'd like them better!
Especially all of the other Jam 5 Mods, Forgotten Castaways, and Fret's Quest.
Those are some of the ones I thought were really good and creative!
What are you waiting for? Go play it!
Though, don't expect the best puzzles. It's mostly a writing exercise.
I hope you have fun talking to everyone else!
Also go play forgotten castaways i will promote that mod to my deathbed.
